Please select control panel you need by adding buttons below.
Note: When power exceed this value,it will report automatically
Note: Maximum power of power-off protection

Time out,not reaching the close position

Please enter name of the new key
Please add device and learn the button.
This key is set for accrediting the output excecuted when device is restarted
\tTo ensure the safety of your family and prevent cancel of defence out of misoperation , please enter the gateway password to verify.
This area has no monitoring device
A new version is detected, update now?
check whether hear [beep] prompt or not
Select the notification state of the sensor
Current playlist is empty, add sound
Password Shall Be Six Numbers Only
The Expiration Date Shall Be Later than the Effective Date
Presetting bit unset. Set it in camera interface.
Different types of firmware. Unable to upgrade.
Open WiFi and connect to saved WiFi.
Out of LAN. Unable to upgrade.
Unable to open sound channel, please return.
Unable to obtain configuration file, please check network.
After finish, return to this interface and click Next.
Input WiFi name and password in Adding Other Network Option
Connect to Mini Gateway WiFi,\n then return to Smart Home App
Connect Mini Gateway to the Internet and boost WiFi signal by configuring WiFi repeater.
Your network connection is unstable. Try again.
Power on the device and click Next after hearing voice prompt.
Welcome to use Mini Gateway \n WiFi repeater configuration is recommended for first login
WiFi would be disconnected in configuration. Your operation might be affected. Pay attention to voice prompt of Mini Gateway and continue to use after re-login.
Drag 4 corners to change the size of protection zone; Click and drag to change the position of protection zone.
Invalid Casual user of lock body switched off
Network timeout. Connect to network again.
No video, direct to unlocking interface
Connect to Smart Door Guardian WiFi hotspot starting with CamAp_
After Smart Retina Doorlock is on, insert a needle into configuration hole. Wait for prompt voice [beep] for 3 times.
After connection, return to this interface and click Next.
Device connection error. Try again later.
Ensure network in good state and more than 50% battery left. Upgrading takes about 3 mins. Please notice voice prompt.
Device is restarted. Wait for 1-2 mins.
State: locked inside and admin password needed
Connection timeout. Please exit and try again.
Client request failed. Try again later.
Try again and check WiFi password
Current electrical power exceeds power rating. Power cut off.
Failed to edit Smart Door Guardian
Has shared your Smart Door Guardian with %d users

The device has been bound and the former user can still check video after you connect the device to network. It is recommended to cancel sharing after successful network connection for the sake of security.
After Smart Door Guardian is turned on, insert a needle into configuration hole. Red light will flash and wait for prompt voice [beep] for 3 times.
Voice: Network connection failed. Try again.
Move to the next step according to the voice prompt.
Device and channel connecting, please wait.
Former users cannot check video after WiFi connection. Please notify them or share again.
Failed to obtain UID. Try again
Note: The slave cannot be used to login after binding and should be managed in host.
Settings for device controlled by slave are unavailable in host after unbinding.
Please log in with Wulian account
Are you sure to unbind the lock?
Formatting will empty all the data on the SD card
Please insert a SD card into the camera first
Are you sure to delete the phone?
Select photos you want to share
Select photos you want to delete
Are you sure to empty all the code data base in the Smart IR Transmitter?
Are you sure to delete remote controller?
Fail to access code data base of air conditioner!
Fail to access code data base of air conditioner!
Current electrical power exceeds power rating. Power cut off.
Set the received infrared signal to the key or not?
After modifying it, WiFi of the gateway will restart. Please check your network.
Please keep proper distance between Smart Door Guardian and router
The password needs at least 8 bits
Admin account used on other clients, log in again!
Please aim the camera to the defense area, then press Next
Only 2 steps are needed for protection
Drag the green rectangle to the area needs to be defensed, the four corners can be dragged at the same time
Set successfully. You will receive push notification when an exception occurs in the defense area
This user has been shared or bound
Select the system according to actual conditions
Synchronize time on the mobile phone to device
Camera provides protection for all day 24 hours
Start time should be before end time

Wait until the camera flashes red quickly,
Press “Next”
Operation fails, please try again later

Quickly tap SYS5 times
to see whether you can hear [beep] prompt voice
Bind/Unbind mode is on, please follow the following operations:
1. Press and hold SET Key, press the key that needs to be bound/unbound within 20s, and then loosen SET Key
2. If indicator of binding button flashes 3 times, binding/unbinding succeeds, if it flashes 6 times, binding/unbinding fails.
Restore to the state before power failure
After startup, if the device is supplied after power failure, the device will return to the state before power failure. And the default is OFF.
Detected current electrical power exceeds power rating. Power cut off.
Note: when using high power or more dangerous electrical equipment, please do not open this function with no one aside to prevent accidents
Custom range of overload protection value is 10~2200W
Please check whether the barcode / QR code is smart products supported by Wulian
Turn on Networking Mode of air-conditioning
Aligned remote controller to air conditioning and press "Transversal Wind" or "Wide Wind" 6 times, after hearing network prompt the air conditioning begins to network
Smart Air Conditioning fails to bind
Follow these steps to check possible problems and try again
1. Confirm your device is under Networking Mode
3. Confirm your phone connected 2.4GHz network of wireless router
4. Confirm the wireless router has closed blacklist (mac address filtration)
5. Please try to set the bandwidth of wireless router to 11bg or 20Mhz, then network; after the networking successfully, set the router back to the original configuration.
Network error, please check the network
Set the network to WiFi mode
Set your phone to WiFi connection, and make sure that the air conditioning is in the same LAN with WiFi
Please check whether the barcode / QR code is smart products supported by Wulian
Sleep Mode is not available under air mode
Energy Mode cannot work under Dual Mode
No delay task has been set
Toggle status of switch will cancel the delay task that you have set
When seeing the lens rotates, press Next
Please log in with Wulian account
No video during the selected period
1.Please unplug and insert your camera power cable, make sure the power cable and data cable is pluged correctly.
2.Make sure to click SYS key twice successively in 2s, and try again according to this method.
3.You can press and hold the SET Key of Smart Lookever Camera (SYS OF Cylincam) 10s, after the camera starting up successfully, retry step 2;
4. Other problem, you can contact us by the following ways:
Networking error, please connect the Internet
1. Please turn screen brightness to the highest, and close the screensaver and auto-lock;
2. Do not scan QR Code in direct sunlight or in hard light;
3. Please use paper or cleaning cloth to wipe the lens lightly

Wulian is committed to the security of your Smart Home system, and is launching authentication towards third-party devices. Please scan the activation code on Operation Guide to activate network for the first use.
Scan activation code on Operation Guide
Do not login through account system, please register first and try again
No music on the synchronized device, please add
No music, please create through "Create a music list"
Please use pin to press WiFi configuration key on the side of device once to see if a “beep” sound can be heard
Put the QR code on mobile phone to Door Guardian lens 10-20 cm, scan and add the device
Failed to add Wulian Door Guardian
Please use pin to press WiFi configuration key for 10s, waiting for indication light to turn red and voice broadcast “device reset successfully”
Set password for remote door opening
Modified information has not been synchronized into device, conform to exit now?
Modified information has not been synchronized into device, conform to copy to the next day?
Modified information has not been synchronized into device, conform to leave now?
Thermostat should be turned on while you performing the task
Network is unstable, please make your music box / gateway closer to router and try again
Activation code do not support the device
Risk remains when over temperature protection turned off. Confirm?
Built-in sensor abnormality. Please contact working staff: +86-400 889 2891
Built-in sensor abnormality.3 ways available to solve.
1. If no need of external sensors, turn off floor over temperature protection.
3. If no problem with connection of external sensors,Please contact working staff: +86-400 889 2891
Abnormality with external and built-in sensors.Please contact working staff: +86-400 889 2891
Device name supports up to 15 characters.

Quickly clickSYSbutton twice
to see if it swings?
SD card cannot be used.Please format it first.
Formatting will change the SD card to FAT32 format and delete all data in the card
Formatting erases all data in SD card
The request of playback has timed out
Please follow the voice prompt to the next step
SD card is formatting. Please wait.
The number of connections exceeds the limit
The data of presetting position is synchronizing, please wait
The current QR code has expired, please reconfigure
Connect camera power<br/>wait for camera <font color=#eb743b>indicator turns on </font>and then，<br/>choose your networking method</string>
Please check if camera indicator stays on in blue color. If blue light flashes, error may happen in WiFi password or WiFi cannot be connected, please reconfigure

![CDATA[Connect camera power，wait for camera indicator turns red and flashesthen
，click "next"]]
Wired connection, please plug the network cable to connect to the network!
Please activate device in device list
The current administrator verification is invalid, please re-verify!
Can only start disinfection function when clothes bar put to the top
When someone passes by, it automatically turns on lights, and can be used as security device when turned off
When someone passes by, it turns on lights according to the surrounding lighting environment
Delay to turn off the lights
You can unlock through Touch ID with an existing fingerprint
Place your finger on Home key to verify your fingerprint
Fingerprint does not match Touch ID fingerprint. Please try again
Fingerprint is set successfully, you can unlock through lock interface by it
Touch ID is ready and you can unlock it with added fingerprint
Please enter the password into doorlock interface to complete unlocking, then set according to the prompts
Too many failures, please use password verification.
Card [%s] unlocking detected, you can set a nickname for it, or manage it in the top-right menu
Fingerprint [%s] unlocking detected, you can set a nickname for it, or manage it in the top-right menu
User [%s] unlocking detected, you can set a nickname for it, or manage it in the top-right menu
Keep App in this page, and quick click device SET key for 4 times to re-submit device information. (LED light powers off first before powers on)
The current edit is not saved. Do you want to discard it?
Add scenes that need to be executed
Add devices that need to be executed
Triggering events and executing tasks cannot select scenes at the same time
The setting is successful and will stop playing after %s
Time setting for stop playing is canceled
Follow the last playlist if no song to be added
1. Put IR transmitter towards device you want to match
2. Click “Test Button” to see if device responds
3. Click “respond” to replace test buttons for further test until the match is successful and download automatically; click “no response” to replace to the next code base
Code base download failed, please put IR transmitter near gateway and retry
When red light of IR transmitter is on, press the button of remote controller towards black receiving area
Select the button you want to learn
When red light of IR transmitter is on, press the button of remote controller towards black receiving area
Point IR transmitter towards air conditioner
Click buttons like "power", \'mode","+","-" to see if device responds
If it responds, click code base download; or switch code base to continue test
2. Click power button, and choose model, temperature, swing wind and other parameters, then click "Save" on upper right corner
Note: Click "Send to Air Conditioner" to send the current settings to the air conditioner for execution
No content, click the program details of the "%s" to add favorites
Some modes cannot be searched, try key words search or match through test button
If you do not know the model, match through test button
Current role is fog computing slave
You can switch into fog computing host, which can control, manage devices under slaves in LAN
Switch into fog computing host successfully
You have already set this gateway as host and can add and control slaves through “host” in control center
Current role is fog computing host
You can add and manage slaves through “host” in control center, and can switch roles to slave
Switch into fog computing slave successfully
You have set this gateway into fog computing slave, and can control and manage devices under slaves through host
1.Please connect slave and host(Dream flower, etc.) under the same LAN
2.Log into host; enter into control center and select “host” to manage
Slave has bound into host, please unbind it first
Has added to the maximum number of users, delete unwanted users and re-add!
Before turning on the power switch, please confirm whether someone is under power-off operation
Device temperature sensor is abnormal, please contact the staff for replacement!
Message switch for locking and unlocking; no message will be received when turned off
Message switch for door card, button, fingerprint, key unlocking; no message will be received when turned off
Message switch for locking inside and unlocking; no message will be received when turned off
The password length should be in 6 digits
Confirm to restore to factory default settings
Gateway zigbee network reset and gateway information restore to factory settings.
Reset zigbee network, sub-devices will need to rejoin to network. Confirm?
Reset gateway network, gateway will lose all configuring information, Confirm?
Note: Gateway is going to activate, please re-connect
Current slave is controlled by host, please unbind
Current gateway do not support this function
When turned on, reminding will be received if device is on for successively 8 hours
Reminding will be received when hood running time reaches to the setting hours
Continuous boot time has reached 8 hours, please shutdown
Cooker hood total running time has reached %s hours, please clean
Gateway restores to factory default settings, please wait 10 ~ 20s
This task require rainbow LED to be in colorful mode
Password setting success,can share by SMS
Password short message has been generated.
Warm tips:the password of smart lock has been modified,new password is :
Press home button to unlock by fingerprint
Please choose the WiFi which you want to configure
This network is encrypted by WEP,please reconnect after setting to WPA/WPA2 encryption way
Please set mini gateway\'s WIFI name and password to the same as this WIFI
Do not set fan speed to "auto" when it is in ventilation mode
Click the below WIFI configuration can switch WIFI
The valid time should lag than current time
Go to device page to set password
When you hear welcome voice, click Next.
Stab the WiFi button \n Do you hear "Waiting for config"?
Have you installed door lock pinch plate?
You can get more informations after you installed door lock pinch plate
It can enter WIFI configuration mode automatically after power on
Long press rangehood "WIFI button"until indicator is flashing to enter WIFI configuration mode
Press “+”and “-”button of gas cooker at the same time to enter WIFI configuration mode
In unlock mode,long press"refrigerate"button until there is a beep, then the indicator will flash which means it is in WIFI configuration mode.
Refrigerator will adapt to the most appropriate temperature in smart mode,no other setting is needed.
Timing can not be changed after it is executed
Reminder for turning off the fire
If one of stove has been lighting for 5hours more,there will be a reminder for turning off the fire
Fire has been lighting for 5 hours,please confirm whether it should be turned off or not.
Select"spin",then press" reservation"twice,"drying"once" and"reservation"once to enter WIFI configuration mode.
Being laundry, can not be appointed
Reservation have been set, turning off will invalid it
Laundry finished, please take away clothes in time
Device is offline, please check network and device state
Reservation time can not be less than laundry total operation time
Device is not ready, please check or pull down to refresh
One key to turn off all device
Slave control device can not choose, please operate through master control device.
Mode switch will invalid previous binding, sure to switch?
Current mode do not support this operation
Please set the device switch mode
Please set the device switch mode on, then do binding
After dimmer switch is bound, 1-key is for turn brighter, 2-key is for turn darker. Current key is not enough.
After curtain controller is bound, 1-key is open, 2-key is pause, 3-key is close. Current key is not enough.
Please ensure this cell phone have connect to wifi
Device added is only permitted under cover of wifi network
1. Find "system" menu in home page of host device and enter
Aim QR code of cell phone to camera of outdoor sub-device in 10-20cm distance to scan and add
Binding device. It takes some time, please be patient
2. WiFi password error or it contains space
3. Device error(please reboot device and try again)
Binding failure could be below reasons:
1. Router WiFi is 5GHz band, but guardian only supports 2.4GHz band
2. Router uses unsupported encryption, e.g. WEP
The device is already binded to an account:
Procceed to continue will unbind from previous account
The device is already binded, no need to rebind

Please add guardian to Monitor of gateway with doorlock

Please set timing for right stove
Switch the button to "spin",long press"temp."button for 2secs until icon is flashing,that means enter WIFI configuration mode
